summary: High-performing executive with extensive hospitality and luxury lifestyle experience. A strategic trendspotter who excels at developing dynamic partnerships and programs that serve as the impetus for multi-tiered marketing campaigns as well as top-tier media exposure.

experience.title: Director of Public Relations & Partnerships
experience.company: Affinia Hotel Collection / The Benjamin / The Surrey
experience.description: Lead ideation and craft programming; oversee strategic partnerships and collaborations; manage media relations for hotels/spa; increase email traffic and SEO; improve brand visibility and reach.

experience.title: Marketing Director
experience.description: Re-launched The Benjamin through renovation and brand repositioning; led partnerships with BarkBox, SIN Workouts, and Dr. Robbins; increased package and web revenue; supervised in-house and external teams; supported sales with collateral.

experience.title: Assistant Director/Marketing Manager
experience.description: Launched The National Bar & Dining Rooms with Geoffrey Zakarian; developed guest-centric hotel programming; contributed to website/mobile site development; supported sales with branded collateral; represented company at industry conferences.

experience.title: Account Director
experience.description: Key client and press contact for launches including Montage Beverly Hills, FIG Restaurant, and The Surrey; developed media strategy, secured new clients accounting for significant revenue; produced stories across major outlets.

experience.title: Account Supervisor/SAE
experience.description: Created client campaigns and annual plans; cultivated marketing partners; leveraged media relationships to secure top placements; contributed to awards and new business growth.

education.degree: Master of Journalism: PR/Integrated Communications Science and Library Technology

education.school: University of North Texas & Baylor University
